dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.
dependencies.name: pkgconfig

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependencies.description:
Unsupervised text tokenizer for Neural Network-based text generation.
This is the C++ package.
dependencies.name: sentencepiece

dependent_to.description:
AlpacaFarm is a simulator that enables research and development on
learning from feedback at a fraction of the usual cost, promoting
accessible research on instruction following and alignment.
dependent_to.name: py-alpaca-farm

dependent_to.description: Text utilities, models, transforms, and datasets for PyTorch.
dependent_to.name: py-torchtext

dependent_to.description:
State-of-the-art Natural Language Processing for TensorFlow 2.0 and
PyTorch
dependent_to.name: py-transformers

description:
Unsupervised text tokenizer for Neural Network-based text generation.
These are the Python bindings.
name: py-sentencepiece

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
